original_title: สายลับหมากระเป๋ากับเสาไฟฟ้า
overview: "Shisu" a journalist who is only 150 cm tall. One day, she stumbled across "Faifah", a senior police officer that she has secretly admired since university days. Together they start the investigation in a secret idol underground club.
title: Pint-Size Spy Girl
